edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.view

Interface PassphraseAdapter.OnClickListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    PassphraseAdapter
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface PassphraseAdapter.OnClickListener
    Listener for PassphraseAdapter item clicks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(View view, int position, Passphrase passphrase)
      Handles a click on a specified View in the RecyclerView, corresponding to the Passphrase at index position in the PassphraseAdapter.

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        void onClick(View view,
             int position,
             Passphrase passphrase)
        Handles a click on a specified View in the RecyclerView, corresponding to the Passphrase at index position in the PassphraseAdapter.
        Parameters:
        view - clicked View.
        position - selected item index of the PassphraseAdapter.
        passphrase - Passphrase instance bound to the PassphraseAdapter.Holder at {code position}.
